alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Brown; Custer; Eastern Cherry; Hooker; Logan; McPherson; Thomas; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 5:55PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong winds will impact portions of southeastern Cherry, eastern Hooker, southern Brown, northern Logan, northern McPherson, northwestern Custer, Blaine and Thomas Counties through 730 PM CDT/630 PM MDT/... At 553 PM CDT/453 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong winds on the leading edge of rain showers, extending from near Brownlee to near Tryon. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Thedford, Brewster, Dunning, Halsey, Seneca, Purdum, Brownlee, Elsmere, Raven, Hawley Flats, Willow Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Long Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Linscott, Brown Lake, Norway, Koshopah and Jones Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 190 and 256. Highway 97 between mile markers 38 and 58. Highway 83 between mile markers 124 and 175. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these winds subside.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Brown; Custer; Eastern Cherry; Hooker; Logan; McPherson; Thomas; Western Cherry
